name: Mat Collishaw
caption: Further Fantasy - Exhibition Galleria Giò Marconi, Milano, 1.-21. March 1999, catalogue Associazione Italiana Pellicceria by Vogue Italia.
summary: Matthew "Mat" Collishaw (born 1966 in Nottingham) is an English artist based in London.
